stages.title: Départ from Toulouse Matabiau!
stages.description: I am ready, I am on time, and my train too :)…

stages.title: Canal du Midi
stages.description: I can see the canal from the window!

stages.title: Short stop in Narbonne
stages.description: Not the most exciting part of the trip...

stages.title: Port Leucate
stages.description: I love this part where the train goes between the sea and the lake. Also, if you're watching carefully, you may see the castle of Salses.

stages.title: Girona
stages.description: Girona is a beautiful city but you won't see much from the train.

stages.title: Arrival at Barcelona Sants
stages.description: Here we go! Now let's find the subway.
